akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Chairman of the Council, through the Committee, shall develop a National Global Change Research Plan for implementation of the Program. The Plan shall contain recommendations for national global change research. The Chairman of the Council shall submit the Plan to the Congress within one year after November 16, 1990, and a revised Plan shall be submitted at least once every three years thereafter.

(f) Public participation In developing the Plan, the Committee shall consult with academic, State, industry, and environmental groups and representatives.
